chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), Filter F -> forall (f g : T -> R) (l : Rbar), is_equiv F f g -> filterlim f F (Rbar_locally l) -> filterlim g F (Rbar_locally l)

ClassicalFacts.F : forall A : Prop, ClassicalFacts.has_fixpoint A -> (A -> A) -> A
Inductive Rbar : Set := Finite : R -> Rbar | p_infty : Rbar | m_infty : Rbar For Finite: Argument scope is [R_scope]
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
is_equiv = fun (T : Type) (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (f g : T -> V) => is_domin F g (fun x : T => minus (g x) (f x)) : forall (T : Type) (K : AbsRing) (V : NormedModule K), ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (T -> V) -> (T -> V) -> Prop Arguments T, K, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ function_scope function_scope function_scope]
Rbar_locally = fun (a : Rbar) (P : R -> Prop) => match a with | Finite a0 => locally a0 P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end : Rbar -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
filterlim = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => filter_le (filtermap f F) G : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
filterlim_comp : forall (T U V : Type) (f : T -> U) (g : U -> V) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (H : (V -> Prop) -> Prop), filterlim f F G -> filterlim g G H -> filterlim (fun x : T => g (f x)) F H
equiv_le_2 : forall F : (?T -> Prop) -> Prop, Filter F -> forall f g : ?T -> ?V, is_equiv F f g -> F (fun x : ?T => norm (g x) <= 2 * norm (f x) /\ norm (f x) <= 2 * norm (g x)) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
filter_filter = fun (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (ProperFilter0 : ProperFilter F) => let (_, filter_filter) := ProperFilter0 in filter_filter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter F -> Filter F Arguments T, F, ProperFilter are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _]
filtermap = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => P (f x)) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filter_le = fun (T : Type) (F G : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) => forall P : T -> Prop, G P -> F P : forall T : Type, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope]
Record ProperFilter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_ProperFilter { filter_ex : forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x; filter_filter : Filter F } For ProperFilter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For ProperFilter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_ProperFilter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope _]
is_domin = fun (T : Type) (Ku Kv : AbsRing) (U : NormedModule Ku) (V : NormedModule Kv) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (f : T -> U) (g : T -> V) => forall eps : posreal, F (fun x : T => norm (g x) <= eps * norm (f x)) : forall (T : Type) (Ku Kv : AbsRing) (U : NormedModule Ku) (V : NormedModule Kv), ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (T -> U) -> (T -> V) -> Prop Arguments T, Ku, Kv, U, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filterlim_ext_loc : forall f g : ?T -> ?U, ?F (fun x : ?T => f x = g x) -> filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?G where ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [ |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
Inductive filter_prod (T U : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : T * U -> Prop) : Prop := Filter_prod : forall (Q : T -> Prop) (R : U -> Prop), F Q -> G R -> (forall (x : T) (y : U), Q x -> R y -> P (x, y)) -> filter_prod F G P For filter_prod: Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted For Filter_prod: Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted For filter_prod: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope] For Filter_prod: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope _ _ function_scope]
equiv_sym : forall f g : ?T -> ?V, is_equiv ?F f g -> is_equiv ?F g f where ?T : [ |- Type] ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
equiv_trans : forall f g h : ?T -> ?V, is_equiv ?F f g -> is_equiv ?F g h -> is_equiv ?F f h where ?T : [ |- Type] ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_pair : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g : ?T -> ?V), filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?H -> filterlim (fun x : ?T => (f x, g x)) ?F (filter_prod ?G ?H) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- Type] ?V : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [ |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?H : [ |- (?V -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
equiv_inv : forall f g : ?T -> R, ?F (fun x : ?T => g x <> 0) -> is_equiv ?F f g -> is_equiv ?F (fun x : ?T => / f x) (fun x : ?T => / g x) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
equiv_carac_1 : forall f g o : ?T -> ?V, (forall x : ?T, f x = plus (g x) (o x)) -> is_domin ?F g o -> is_equiv ?F f g where ?T : [ |- Type] ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
equiv_carac_0 : forall f g : ?T -> ?V, is_equiv ?F f g -> {o : ?T -> ?V | (forall x : ?T, f x = plus (g x) (o x)) /\ is_domin ?F g o} where ?T : [ |- Type] ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
domin_inv : forall f g : ?T -> R, ?F (fun x : ?T => g x <> 0) -> is_domin ?F f g -> is_domin ?F (fun x : ?T => / g x) (fun x : ?T => / f x) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
domin_mult_l : forall f g h : ?T -> R, is_domin ?F f g -> is_domin ?F (fun x : ?T => h x * f x) (fun x : ?T => h x * g x) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
domin_mult_r : forall f g h : ?T -> R, is_domin ?F f g -> is_domin ?F (fun x : ?T => f x * h x) (fun x : ?T => g x * h x) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_comp_2 : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g : ?T -> ?V) (h : ?U -> ?V -> ?W), filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?H -> filterlim (fun x : ?U * ?V => h (fst x) (snd x)) (filter_prod ?G ?H) ?I -> filterlim (fun x : ?T => h (f x) (g x)) ?F ?I where ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- Type] ?V : [ |- Type] ?W : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [ |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?H : [ |- (?V -> Prop) -> Prop] ?I : [ |- (?W -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
continuity_pt_filterlim' : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), continuity_pt f x < -> filterlim f (locally' x) (locally (f x))
continuity_pt_filterlim : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), continuity_pt f x < -> filterlim f (locally x) (locally (f x))

locally_dist_filter : forall (T : Type) (d : T -> R), Filter (locally_dist d)
filterlim_filter_le_1 : forall f : ?T -> ?U, filter_le ?G ?F -> filterlim f ?F ?H -> filterlim f ?G ?H where ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- Type] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?H : [ |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop]
filterlim_norm_zero : forall f : ?U -> ?V, filterlim (fun x : ?U => norm (f x)) ?F (locally 0) -> filterlim f ?F (locally zero) where ?U : [ |- Type] ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [ |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
domin_scal_l : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g : ?T -> ?V) (c : ?Ku), (exists y : ?Ku, mult y c = one) -> is_domin ?F f g -> is_domin ?F (fun x : ?T => scal c (f x)) g where ?T : [ |- Type] ?Ku : [ |- AbsRing] ?Kv : [ |- AbsRing] ?U : [ |- NormedModule ?Ku] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?Kv] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
domin_rw_l : forall (f1 f2 : ?T -> ?U) (g : ?T -> ?V), is_equiv ?F f1 f2 -> is_domin ?F f1 g -> is_domin ?F f2 g where ?T : [ |- Type] ?Ku : [ |- AbsRing] ?Kv : [ |- AbsRing] ?U : [ |- NormedModule ?Ku] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?Kv] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
domin_scal_r : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g : ?T -> ?V) (c : ?Kv), is_domin ?F f g -> is_domin ?F f (fun x : ?T => scal c (g x)) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?Ku : [ |- AbsRing] ?Kv : [ |- AbsRing] ?U : [ |- NormedModule ?Ku] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?Kv] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]

filterlim_locally : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f x))) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- UniformSpace] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
domin_rw_r : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g1 g2 : ?T -> ?V), is_equiv ?F g1 g2 -> is_domin ?F f g1 -> is_domin ?F f g2 where ?T : [ |- Type] ?Ku : [ |- AbsRing] ?Kv : [ |- AbsRing] ?U : [ |- NormedModule ?Ku] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?Kv] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_locally_ball_norm : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball_norm y eps (f x))) where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
continuity_pt = fun (f : R -> R) (x0 : R) => continue_in f no_cond x0 : (R -> R) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope]
PCond : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
domin_plus : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g1 g2 : ?T -> ?V), is_domin ?F f g1 -> is_domin ?F f g2 -> is_domin ?F f (fun x : ?T => plus (g1 x) (g2 x)) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?Ku : [ |- AbsRing] ?Kv : [ |- AbsRing] ?U : [ |- NormedModule ?Ku] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?Kv] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
Ring_polynom.PEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> R
continuity_pt_locally' : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), continuity_pt f x < -> (forall eps : posreal, locally' x (fun u : R_UniformSpace => Rabs (f u - f x) < eps))
continuity_pt_locally : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), continuity_pt f x < -> (forall eps : posreal, locally x (fun u : R_UniformSpace => Rabs (f u - f x) < eps))
FEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> FExpr C -> R

```coq
intros T F H f g l Heq Hfl.
apply filterlim_comp_2 with (F := F); auto.
